name: SpeechTextDoneProcPtr
desc: Defines a pointer to a text-done callback functionthat is called when the Speech Synthesis Manager has finished processinga buffer of text.
declaration: typealias SpeechTextDoneProcPtr = (SpeechChannel, SRefCon, UnsafeMutablePointer<UnsafeRawPointer?>?, UnsafeMutablePointer<UInt>, UnsafeMutablePointer<Int32>) -> Void
